llm.emotional_summary: I started off feeling okay, but then got a bit frustrated by the income field.
llm.overall_experience_feedback: The application process was mostly straightforward, which was nice.  I filled in my personal details without any problems and then moved onto the employment section.  It was a bit annoying when I got an error because of the comma in my income.  I thought it would have automatically removed that for me. I did appreciate that it told me what was wrong, however, so I could fix it.  I eventually submitted the application successfully.
suggestions: Improve error messages to be more user friendly and suggest how to fix the issue.
Add automatic formatting/removal of commas and other special characters in fields like income to make the process smoother.
